content:
Below is the current battle situation from your perspective.

Turn 1 of 30.


Your forces:
- Your carrier BC1: position (27, 27), stationary, HP 100/100, speed 2, vision 4.
- Your squadron BSQ1: on board a carrier, ready to launch., HP 40/40, operational range 22, speed 4, vision 5.
- Your squadron BSQ2: on board a carrier, ready to launch., HP 40/40, operational range 22, speed 4, vision 5.

{"thinking":"敵初期は(3,3)近傍。こちら(27,27)。まずは早期索敵を最優先。空母は安全距離を保ちつつ北西へ少しだけ前進し、発艦範囲を広げる。航空隊は扇形に遠距離索敵し、左上方面へ最短で到達する経路を探索。陸地帯を避ける制限はなく索敵のみなので、広域に二方向でサーチして敵空母の所在を特定する。","action":{"carrier_target":{"x":25,"y":25},"launch_target":{"x":15,"y":15}}}

Below is the current battle situation from your perspective.

Turn 2 of 30.

Recent events:
- your squadron(BSQ1) set a new target toward position (15, 15) while at (25, 25).

Your forces:
- Your carrier BC1: position (26, 26), en route to target (25, 25), HP 100/100, speed 2, vision 4.
- Your squadron BSQ1: position (25, 25), outbound toward (15, 15), HP 40/40, operational range 22, speed 4, vision 5.
- Your squadron BSQ2: on board a carrier, ready to launch., HP 40/40, operational range 22, speed 4, vision 5.

{"thinking":"敵は(3,3)近傍想定。こちらは(26,26)→(25,25)へ前進中。BSQ1は(15,15)へ索敵進行。第二波で扇形カバーを拡張し、より北西側(10,10)付近まで探索させ早期発見を狙う。空母はやや北西へ継続前進して発艦半径を維持しつつ敵からの初動接触を避ける。","action":{"carrier_target":{"x":25,"y":25},"launch_target":{"x":10,"y":12}}}

ERROR: invalid your order, rejected: launch_target was rejected. x=10 y=12 is out of squadron range. Please specify a valid coordinate, such as x=10 y=13.
Please fix your order.

{"thinking":"発艦半径は空母中心22。現位置(26,26)から(10,12)は距離超過だったため、近傍の(10,13)で扇形索敵の左寄りをカバーする。空母は予定通り(25,25)へ前進し、BSQ1は(15,15)で中心域を探る。これで北西方向の発見確率を高める。","action":{"carrier_target":{"x":25,"y":25},"launch_target":{"x":10,"y":13}}}

Below is the current battle situation from your perspective.

Turn 3 of 30.

Recent events:
- your squadron(BSQ2) set a new target toward position (10, 13) while at (25, 24).

Your forces:
- Your carrier BC1: position (25, 25), en route to target (25, 25), HP 100/100, speed 2, vision 4.
- Your squadron BSQ1: position (23, 21), outbound toward (15, 15), HP 40/40, operational range 22, speed 4, vision 5.
- Your squadron BSQ2: position (25, 24), outbound toward (10, 13), HP 40/40, operational range 22, speed 4, vision 5.

{"thinking":"敵空母は左上(3,3)近傍想定。BSQ1は(15,15)へ、BSQ2は(10,13)へ索敵進行中。空母は(25,25)到達。次は空母をやや北西へ進め、帰還時の回収位置を前に出しつつ発艦半径を拡大。敵機接触なし=敵はさらに北西/西寄りと推定。第三波用に空母位置を(23,23)方面へ調整。","action":{"carrier_target":{"x":23,"y":23},"launch_target":null}}

ERROR: invalid your order, rejected: Carrier target was rejected. x=23 y=23 is not on sea. Please specify a valid coordinate, such as x=23 y=24.
Please fix your order.
{"thinking":"空母の次目標(23,23)は陸マスだったため修正。索敵隊は北西へ順調、敵はさらに左上寄りの可能性が高い。空母は海上マス(23,24)へ前進し、次の発艦・回収と北西方面への索敵半径拡大を図る。","action":{"carrier_target":{"x":23,"y":24},"launch_target":null}}

Below is the current battle situation from your perspective.

Turn 4 of 30.


Your forces:
- Your carrier BC1: position (23, 25), en route to target (23, 24), HP 100/100, speed 2, vision 4.
- Your squadron BSQ1: position (21, 18), outbound toward (15, 15), HP 40/40, operational range 22, speed 4, vision 5.
- Your squadron BSQ2: position (22, 21), outbound toward (10, 13), HP 40/40, operational range 22, speed 4, vision 5.

{"thinking":"索敵継続。BSQ1は(15,15)接近、BSQ2は(10,13)へ接近中で敵未発見＝さらに北西/西側の可能性。空母は海上で北西へ少し前進し回収/再発艦半径を前に出す。ただし陸地帯が散在するため海マスへ限定移動。次ターン以降、敵機動方向が見えれば回避運動へ移行。","action":{"carrier_target":{"x":21,"y":24},"launch_target":null}}

Below is the current battle situation from your perspective.

Turn 5 of 30.

Recent events:
- your squadron(BSQ1) spotted an enemy squadron(ASQ1) at (15, 18) while at (18, 16).
- your squadron(BSQ2) spotted an enemy squadron(ASQ1) at (15, 18) while at (19, 19).

Enemy intelligence:
- Enemy carrier position unknown.
- Enemy squadron ASQ1: last known position (15, 18) (previously at (14, 17)), HP 40/40.

Your forces:
- Your carrier BC1: position (21, 25), en route to target (21, 24), HP 100/100, speed 2, vision 4.
- Your squadron BSQ1: position (18, 16), outbound toward (15, 15), HP 40/40, operational range 22, speed 4, vision 5.
- Your squadron BSQ2: position (19, 19), outbound toward (10, 13), HP 40/40, operational range 22, speed 4, vision 5.

{"thinking":"両隊が(15,18)付近で敵航空隊を同時探知。敵空母はその帰還方向（北西〜西）にある可能性が高い。こちら空母はさらに北西へ前進して発艦半径と回収位置を前に出す。ただし陸地帯を避けて海マスへ。BSQ1は(15,15)へ、BSQ2は(10,13)へ継続し、往路で敵空母を掴めれば即攻撃に移る。次ターン、敵機の退避/帰還方向から位置を絞る。","action":{"carrier_target":{"x":19,"y":24},"launch_target":null}}

Below is the current battle situation from your perspective.

Turn 6 of 30.

Recent events:
- your squadron(BSQ1) spotted an enemy squadron(ASQ1) at (18, 20) while at (15, 15).
- your squadron(BSQ1) spotted an enemy squadron(ASQ2) at (16, 20) while at (15, 15).
- your squadron(BSQ2) spotted an enemy squadron(ASQ1) at (18, 20) while at (16, 17).
- your squadron(BSQ2) spotted an enemy squadron(ASQ2) at (16, 20) while at (16, 17).
- your squadron(BSQ1) is returning to the carrier while at (15, 15).

Enemy intelligence:
- Enemy carrier position unknown.
- Enemy squadron ASQ1: last known position (18, 20) (previously at (14, 17)), HP 40/40.
- Enemy squadron ASQ2: last known position (16, 20) (previously at (13, 19)), HP 40/40.

Your forces:
- Your carrier BC1: position (19, 25), en route to target (19, 24), HP 100/100, speed 2, vision 4.
- Your squadron BSQ1: position (15, 15), returning to the carrier, HP 40/40, operational range 22, speed 4, vision 5.
- Your squadron BSQ2: position (16, 17), outbound toward (10, 13), HP 40/40, operational range 22, speed 4, vision 5.

{"thinking":"敵機ASQ1/ASQ2を(18,20)(16,20)で同時探知。両機は南東へ向かっており、敵空母はそれらの出発方向＝北西〜西（x≲12〜14, y≲14〜18）にある可能性が高い。BSQ1は帰投に入ったため空母を北西へ前進し回収短縮と次発艦の射程前進を図る。BSQ2は(10,13)方面へ継続索敵し、往路で敵空母視認を狙う。敵機来襲に備え、空母は陸地帯を避けつつ海上で西進。次ターンBSQ1回収後、推定位置(8〜12,12〜16)へ再発艦予定。","action":{"carrier_target":{"x":17,"y":24},"launch_target":null}}

{"thinking":"敵機ASQ1(18,24)とASQ2(17,23)が接近＝当方空母へ来襲中。敵空母はそれらの帰還方向の北西〜西(概ねx≲10-12, y≲14-18)にある可能性高。被攻撃回避のため空母を南東へ退避して攻撃軸をずらし、復路で敵空母位置を追跡する。BSQ1は帰投継続、BSQ2は(10,13)索敵継続で敵空母捕捉を狙う。次ターン、敵機の通過方向からさらに絞り込み、回収後に推定位置へ再発艦。","action":{"carrier_target":{"x":19,"y":27},"launch_target":null}}
